cards.title: Bright Colors
cards.content: Brightly colored textures, but not pink and girly! Just like the show

cards.title: Close to Vanilla
cards.content: Being similar to the default textures, doesn't make your builds look completely different

cards.title: Ponified Mobs
cards.content: Compatible with [Mine Little Pony](https://minelittlepony-mod.com/) ponified mobs

cards.title: Cross-Platform
cards.content: Available for both Java and Bedrock (MCPE and Windows 10) editions

cards.title: Add-on Packs
cards.content: Has various add-on packs to customize the look and feel of the pack
